'''''In the Language of Flowers, the Lumidouce Bell Means...?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player need to wait one in-game day, then pick up the [[Lumidouce Bell]] left by [[Talochard]] after completing the {{Quest|Questions and Answers}}.

The Lumidouce Bell is located in a camp on the coast southeast of the [[Opera Epiclese]] along with a [[Questions and Answers#Messily-Written Letter|Messily-Written Letter]].
